name: NEVER EAT CHEESE BEFORE BED
description:
N.E.C.B.B. is an episodic collection of interactive nightmare art where you will explore the different bizarre dreams that were captured on tape by scientists in an attempt to find out if cheese actually affects you when you sleep.

Part 0 - "Woods" (Teaser) (Available Now)

Part 1- "Deep" (Coming soon)

IN A WAREHOUSE.

IN THE BASEMENT.

THEY FOUND A BODY.

WIRES IN HIS SKULL.

THE MACHINE HE WAS ATTACHED TO... GONE.

ALL THAT IS LEFT IS A CORPSE.

A ROTTING CORPSE.

AND A SERIES OF UNLABELED VIDEO TAPES.

SOMETHING IN THE MAN'S HAND.

A NOTE FROM SOME SORT OF EXPERIMENT

"It is yet undetermined if the consumption of dairy prior to sleep affects one's dreams. We hope that as of today, we will be able to find out for sure."

--------------------------------------------------

A Very Special Thanks to @RabbitRunDev for helping me throughout this project.

& Thank You To Those Who Continue To Inspire Me: @corpsepile / @duskdev / @daneelgames / @hauntedPs1 / @dreadXP_ / @TorpleDook / @Airdorf / @ModusPwnin

This list will definitely grow.
